subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which renowned battlefield is associated with the Maharaja Sawai Madho Singh I?
question_hi: महाराजा सवाज़ी माधो सिंह एक स्पष्ट परीक्षा का विषय है।
explanation_en: Kishangarh Fort, also known as Kishangarhagarh, is associated with Maharaja Sawai Man Singh II and the famous Rajput queen Rani Padmini.
subject: Rajput Rajas
question_en: Which of the following kings was instrumental in the construction of Chittorgarh Fort?
explanation_en: Khem Singh was instrumental in the construction of Chittorgarh Fort.
subject: Rajput Rajas
explanation_en: Chittorgarh Fort was built in 1534 during the rule of Rana Kumbha.

1468 years after the establishment of Chittor
